title: ALL SOLD; EPDG T206 Bender portrait
author: 3-2-count

posts.post_title: ALL SOLD; EPDG T206 Bender portrait
posts.post_content:
Couple stunners for sale. Payment via PayPal please. (with no added fee)
Prices include insured shipping. Please email if interested - [url]andreatny@q.com[/url]
Thanks all, Tony

Low pop report EPDG Chief Bender portrait SGC 40+ (7 total between Sgc/Psa) - SOLD
Has a light front surface crease right side shoulder high that runs into his buttons. Very hard to see!

(3) examples for reference of similar valued HOF's with EPDG backs that recently ended in Goodwin's latest auction. 
The Bender is so much nicer than all 3 of these examples and is also a lower populated card. End sales pitch rant! ;)

[url]http://www.goodwinandco.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=25589&searchby=0&searchvalue=None&page=2&sortby=0&displayby=2&lotsperpage=100&category=1&seo=T206-El-Principe-De-Gales-Johnny-Evers-Portrait-PSA-3-VG[/url]
[url]http://www.goodwinandco.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=25590&searchby=0&searchvalue=None&page=2&sortby=0&displayby=2&lotsperpage=100&category=1&seo=T206-El-Principe-De--Gales-Willie-Keeler-Portrait-PSA-4-VG-EX[/url]
[url]http://www.goodwinandco.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=25594&searchby=0&searchvalue=None&page=2&sortby=0&displayby=2&lotsperpage=100&category=1&seo=T206-El-Principe-De-Gales-Ed-Walsh-PSA-4-VG-EX[/url]


Psa 3 Miller Huggins portrait SC 350 - SOLD!! (you won't find a nicer image)
Light surface crease on right side, shoulder high (Former Wonka Collection card :))
Stunner is right, that Bender is fantastic.

[quote name="3-2-count" post=1162248](Former Wonka Collection card :))[/QUOTE]

Way to lower the value of your cards Tony.

[quote name="wonkaticket" post=1162355]Way to lower the value of your cards Tony.[/QUOTE]

Are you kidding me brother? With the Wonka pedigree present the Huggins brought me a .001% better return. :D
The Wonka part put me over the top ;)
I love the Bender as well. Just for a reference of how beautiful the Bender is here's my low grade Bender ELPG.

my card arrived today ... i just wanted to say i am extremely happy with the card, and would gladly conduct business with this seller again

thank you mr. andrea, and thank you net54!

Derek

[quote name="DerekMichael" post=1164507]my card arrived today ... i just wanted to say i am extremely happy with the card, and would gladly conduct business with this seller again

thank you mr. andrea, and thank you net54!

Hi Derek. Very happy to hear that the Chief has found a good home. Enjoy!!
da' chief is smoking hot ... thanks again man, very happy to add this one to my modest collection
